parameters.definition: Cost of a commercial on Pi TV
Audience reach of a commercial on Pi TV
Maximum number of commercials allowed on Beta Video
Cost of a commercial on Beta Video
Audience reach of a commercial on Beta Video
Cost of a commercial on Gamma Live
Audience reach of a commercial on Gamma Live
Maximum proportion of total commercials that can be on Gamma Live
Minimum proportion of total commercials that must be on Pi TV

description: A food company would like to run its commercials on three streaming platforms: Pi TV, Beta Video and Gamma Live. The cost for a commercial as well as the expected audience reach is given. On Pi TV, a commercial costs \param{CostPiTV} and attracts \param{ReachPiTV} viewers. On Beta Video, a commercial costs \param{CostBetaVideo} and attracts \param{ReachBetaVideo} viewers. On Gamma Live, a commercial costs \param{CostGammaLive} and attracts \param{ReachGammaLive} viewers. Beta Video limits the number of commercials from a single company to \param{MaxCommercialsBetaVideo}. In order to attract a wide range of people, at most \param{MaxPropGammaLive} of all commercials should occur on Gamma Live and a minimum of \param{MinPropPiTV} should occur on Pi TV. If the weekly budget is \param{WeeklyBudget}, how many commercials should be run in each of the three possible choices in order to maximize audience?
